summary: AFTER THE VEHICLE WAS SERVICED FOR NHTSA RECALL 03V121000 CONCERNING  POWER STEERING PUMP, VEHICLE EXPERIENCED ONGOING STEERING PROBLEMS.  CONSUMER STATED WARRANTY EXPIRED,  AND DEALER  REFUSED TO ADMIT THAT VEHICLE WAS RUNNING IN GOOD CONDITIONS. DEALER  CHARGED CONSUMER  EVERY TIME VEHICLE WAS BROUGHT IN FOR A STEERING PROBLEM.  *AK
